gruppe.irc

Class SimpleAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet
      • gruppe.irc.SimpleAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.text.AttributeSet, javax.swing.text.MutableAttributeSet

    public class SimpleAttributes
extends javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet
    This is the class where our color and font options are stored.
    Author:
    Anders, Christian and Olaf.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • initiateStyles

        public void initiateStyles()
        Initiates the styles by creating new StyleItems and giving them appropriate names.

      • updateAttributes

        public void updateAttributes()
        Function that updates the attributes by going through the styleItem vector. ensures that font family and size only loads if customA is true, and there actually are fonts set.

      • savePreferences

        public void savePreferences()
        Saving preferences using the vector of styleItems. Gets the colorname (string) from styleItem and saves it with "color" as prefix.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Function that "clears" the custom preferences. What it really does is setting the variable customPrefix to "false". And when the next time preferences load, it says "false" instead of "true".

      • setAttributeColor

        public void setAttributeColor(java.lang.Integer index,
                     java.awt.Color type)

        type -
